items.sentence: Tom was the one who told me not to do that anymore.
Tom is convinced that something is wrong with Mary.
Tom is free to spend his money any way he wants to.
Tom wanted to prove to himself that he could do it.
Everybody in the room was stunned by what happened.
Right now, there isn\'t much that I can do to help.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what Mary told him not to do.
Did Tom tell you that he was having money problems?
Did you all not know that that was going to happen?
I\'ve been here every day for the past three weeks.
